website_summaries.verdict: Taller riders can get into the carver and drifter action with a winged-design scooter.
pros: Casters help riders in drifting or spinning
Removable stability bars help riders learn to use the scooter
cons: Assembly directions are missing a step
Does not fold up as expected, and advertised to do

customer_reviews.title: Nice little scooter
customer_reviews.text: Our 6-year-old loves it however our 9-year-old has had difficulty getting it to move. It takes some practice to get the wheels moving as it requires a certain shifting of weight. It's not a push scooter, but you can really move once you get the hang of it. It was very easy to put it together (10 minutes per scooter) and the top folds down. It's still wide at the wing tips, but easier to store and fit in the car when it's folded up. It appears sturdy and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the weirdest and best purchases that we ever made for our son. My son will literally make himself sick plan on this thing and has a best time doing it. It's so completely different than any of the other razors but in the best way possible. Plus everybody thinks it looks really cool. Oh and by the way if you're looking for the Allen wrench is they are taped onto the back stabilizer bar. I was so frustrated when I couldn't find them but once I put it together I saw them. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: JW tucson

customer_reviews.title: Propel with your own muscles!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this as a Christmas present and loved it! It is self propelled but not by a battery but by your child swinging their hips side to side. It is a work out and she can get tired pretty quick! To use, you hold the handle bars and put a foot on each wing in the back. From there you bend at your knees and start wiggling your hips side to side which helps the scooter to move. The more you do it, the faster you will go.
customer_reviews.author: BG40

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase! We have Flickers for our kids and they love them. They are out growing them so I saw this and purchased it. Amazing! It fits all our kids (ages 7, 9, 11, 17) and even works for the adults. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: EMPeeps

customer_reviews.title: and it's a great height for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old daughter who is very tall for her age, and it's a great height for her! It is a great little trick scooter and glides and spins very easily!!!! I would recommend that they wear not only a helmet but also the full nine yards with the elbow, knee and wrist gaurds!!!! It's very easy to do the tricks (by accident) :) so I've found my daughter wants/needs the extra protection! She loves it once she feels fully protected!!!! Great little scooter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: 8-year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 8-year old for his birthday and it turned out to be a real hit. He originally wanted the spark-generating model but after reading many reviews on how quickly those spark cartridges wear out, we turned our attention to this one. We've had the traditional Razor scooters for our kids over the years but this one takes scooters to a new, more interesting level of entertainment. Our son likes to ride wheelies and spin in 360 degree circles on this. He is very happy to have this over the other forms of Razors.
customer_reviews.author: NC Family

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Razor PowerWing DLX. We bought it for the grandkids when they come over. Everyone used to fight over the first one, so we needed a second one. Easy to set up. Fun to ride. When the neighborhood kids come over, they like to ride it too. The kids have been as young as 4 when they started riding the first one and up to our oldest granddaughter who is 11 and she still loves it. Much better that a regular scooter as they move it by wiggling their behind. As they get older they do some spins, etc on it. They love it! Keeps them occupied, so I love it too!
customer_reviews.author: kathy quilts

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. Easy to ride.
customer_reviews.text: I think this scooter is great. My kids (5 and 8) each received one (smaller version) as Christmas gifts. Both of them really enjoy their Powerwing. I especially like this design for my 5 year old (the smaller version) as it is much easier to ride then the typical scooter and she seems to have greater control of it. As crazy as it may sound, I ended up buying this one (the taller version) for myself to ride with them and I love it. I am 5'4" and it fits me just fine. Delivery was prompt. No complaints. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Benshell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scooter!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a Christmas gift for our 8 year old son and so far, we all love it! Both my husband and I tried it and it's so much fun. With a little bit of practice, you can easily get the hang of it. It gains great speed, so good thing it has a break handle. We always make our son wear a helmet when he's riding it. All the kids in the neighborhood have tried it and they love it as well. Lot's of fun and it keeps the kids active. Having the adjustable handle is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lomeli

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun. This won’t replace a normal scooter, it’s more of a trick scooter. All 4 of my kids love riding on this from elementary school ages up to high schoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to a neighborhood full of 8-10 year old boys!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had researched and looked into several options for my 8 year old. I ultimately decided on this product because it has a bar across the back whereas the other models were like two "steps". I was unsure how my son's legs would fit and wanted him to be able to stand wherever was most comfortable for him vs. where the manufacturer thought his feet should go. Purchased it in November 2014 and he's been using it and loving it ever since. Holds up really well to all the crap he and the neighborhood kids subject it to. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle H.fvcxb

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter, so much fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this scooter so much and he is on it all the time. I have had several parents ask me where I ordered it from. I got mine on sale around Christmas time and was surprised to see the price difference from then to now. The side wings can be sharp, my son actually cut his leg on them so that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Little Bro Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Got this scooter for my six year old brother. I tried to ride it before giving it to him, but I couldn't quite figure out the side to side motion. My little brother rode it like a pro (for having just gotten it), and had to teach me how to ride it! I feel like this new way really makes you work harder when riding the scooter, so it's a little more of a work out.
customer_reviews.author: Kalli

customer_reviews.title: Requires a little more space. You get a little more exercise.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this scooter. It is a little trickier to maneuver so she needs a larger space, but she caught on to it quickly and it gives her more exercise. She really loves that it remains standing and doesn't flop to the ground when you step away for a moment.
customer_reviews.author: amy mccay

customer_reviews.title: kids like them. seem to be decent quality
customer_reviews.text: kids like them. they haven't broken in first five days of use. although stickers came off where they were attached to plastic parts which bums kids out more than you might think. we'll see how well they last but quality seems same as other, regular Razor scooters they've had
customer_reviews.author: RangerRick

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son wanted an electric scooter for his birthday. After researching electric models we found that they didn't last long, etc. we also wanted our son to get exercise and not give up riding his bike. We found this scooter and with some foot and hip movements from the rider it becomes self-propelled. Win! My son loves it. In fact, two other neighbor kids now have one, too.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miley

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loved this, as well as his 34 year old father. :) Was a great price and is beyond fun. We love to watch the kids ride on it and often have to tell the adults to give it back to the kids. Highly recommend to anyone. Very well built product. Hours of entertainment for the joke family.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap rear wheels
customer_reviews.text: I love the scooter itself but the wheels wore away too quickly.. Not very pleased:( coupling bolts stripped
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: This item is really cool. My kids love playing on it and I love doing it as well. Its definitely meant for smooth surfaces. If you hit a decent crack its pretty easy to tip over on this. I would definitely recommend this item unless you will be freqeuntly using it in a location with lots of cracks or bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Chiafolo

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this earlier in the year for my Grandson's birthday in March. I wasn't sure he would be able to make it go, but he did right off. He got it going real fast. Has to be careful turning too sharp, over he went! But he was back on it. It would be good exercise but I'm too big. I need to get another for his brother so they can go together.
customer_reviews.author: MGSchaaf

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Took a little practice for my 8 year old but he picked it up real quick. I was impressed with the build quality improvement on the DLX over the standard version especially for the very little money difference. Did have a warranty issue and Razor was very responsive. We have lots of Razor toys and I remain impressed with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased two of these and love it. Can't beat that it already comes assembled
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased two of these and love it. Can't beat that it already comes assembled. Price was awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: A little boy's dream,
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Razor PowerWing DLX for my ten year old great grandson. He actually liked the scooter better than he did his new bike. I loved the smile on his face when he saw what was his birthday gift and he immediately took it out to ride on the sidewalk in front of our house. The performance was eveything he wanted in a scooter. Carole Yarwood
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Yarwood

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: It is convenient to use and children like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A. Buccio

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The first gift with wheels my son can use easily. My son has some gross-motor delays, nothing huge, but it does keep him from easily learning to ride a bike or skate board. For his seventh birthday, we bought him this scooter and he was able to ride it proficiently within 15 minutes. (Someone else probably will pick it up in five.) He LOVES his scooter, so I'm thrilled. A big thanks to the dad who wrote the review about how the same thing happened with his daughter struggling with other scooters and toys, but being able to excel at this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids but it doesn’t fold up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids but it doesn’t fold up and takes up lots of space in the garage with 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: LazyLummox

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this scooter and it was an upgrade from his regular scooter. However we have had problems with the brake screw coming off. Have looked for a replacement screw but have not found anything yet so he pulls the cord manually when he needs to stop.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is MUCH better then the smaller one which we also own. I recommend to spending the extra money for this one. We got 3 yrs out of the smaller one (still have it) and hope to get even more with this. Hours of fun for my daughter and her friends PLUS the exercise they get from wiggling back and forth...
customer_reviews.author: DAVE MOURADIAN

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 11 year old daughter. She loves it and now all the neighbor kids want one. She found it easy to use. I believe after some time she will be mastering tricks. It's a lot better then a normal scooter.
customer_reviews.author: loretta pickel

customer_reviews.title: Fun and gets you moving.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for our 6 and 8 yo boys, I think we like it better. It is fun and easy to use. Great exercise although we can't get it to go very fast....still pretty fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It is easy enough for me to use too. Don't lean back though. I did and almost fell. This does get your heart pumping and you do need a space that is flat that is bigger than a garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Hackki

customer_reviews.title: Great product, solid build quality and most importantly, FUN!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for my 9-year-old. He was skeptical at first but learned to really enjoy it. It provides a surprisingly smooth ride and is easy to use, even on flat roads and sidewalks. We talked our son out of motorized scooter and he hasn't looked back.
customer_reviews.author: TJ SwimDad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter...speedy!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old just got this for "early Christmas" before we go out of town for the holidays. He's not the most coordinated child, so this is perfect for him. I love that it is metal instead of plastic like the other model. Its pretty fun for adults too! It was a breeze to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: jazzy14

customer_reviews.title: Super activity!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old's birthday. He loves zooming around the neighborhood. I love that he's outside getting exercise! Easy to ride (for a kid) and easy to put together. He did most of the assembly! Smooth riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this. It has been abused for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. It has been abused for a few months now by our kids and their friends and it is holding up well. Great quality and very fun.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Splear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun for kids and adults. Steering bearings a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sargeant

customer_reviews.title: A Great Toy !!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our grandson to use while his dad helped us move. Easy to assemble! He really enjoyed playing with it. They brought appropriate safety gear which should be used. I would recommend for the specified age group.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Emerick

customer_reviews.title: Very Neat Scooter
customer_reviews.text: My child and siblings ( range from 3yrs to 10yrs) all love this scooter. It is fun and easy to ride. Even the 3 year old can get it going. It does ride much better on a very smooth surface ( basement floor) but it does pretty well out in the driveway also. I think it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mallette

customer_reviews.title: WOW So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family cannot get enough of this scooter! It is so much fun that even my husband is obsessed with it! Its not for hills whatsoever though, you need to be on a semi flat area to be able to do tricks and turns,etc. My 10 year old son is a pro on this thing, hes always on it and all his friends now want one, its fantastic exercise. My 6 year old even is pretty good on it, so its a good family scooter. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shavonne Herr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son years ago. It is still in use after much abuse and all his friends and cousins riding it. I even ride it sometimes and I weigh 195.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee !!!

customer_reviews.title: but that is okay if they are having enough fun that they don't care
customer_reviews.text: My son loves riding around on this thing. I think people look kind of silly riding it, but that is okay if they are having enough fun that they don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: All the kids love this scooter!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for each of my daughters. Everyone asks where they can find them when they come over! All the kids LOVE this scooter!!
customer_reviews.author: Oneevs

customer_reviews.title: Best Scooter Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year son got this for Christmas and he loves it!!! We have only been able to ride it in the basement because of snow. It glides so smooth, and turns so easy!! My 5 year old daughter has been sneaking a turn, and she is really good on it! Very good scooter for the price I paid. Very durable, strong scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Keri E. Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Santa brought this for my son
customer_reviews.text: He has really enjoyed it. It's easy to maneuver and we really like the height adjustment on it. My daughter has a Fusion scooter, and the handlebars don't adjust high enough. I wish we had a second of this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Razor Scooter
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old was starting to get bored with his basic razor scooter, this gives him the glide and drift he has wanted. GREAT for those sensory seekers who need to wiggle and jiggle and get out energy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift! younger brother uses it often. he can really get that thing moving
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this. He quickly got the hang of it (after putting on the bike helmet). It was a Christmas purchase that he had to wait to use until the snow melted. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: NLA

customer_reviews.title: Good Mechanics for sturdy ride
customer_reviews.text: Kid love this scooter and sometime i feel like riding on it and i did try it too,, nice scooter with good mechanics. Easy installation and sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dharmesh K. Gnansivam

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, I bought this for myself at age 33. It is a ton of fun and a good work out. However... it flips forward easy if you are not balanced well on it and if you hit a rock or lift in the cement/road. Just make sure you are balanced well. It's nice for taller "kids" too because the handle lifts up for sizing unlike other models of the same scooter.
customer_reviews.author: crazylady

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little scooter and its fun to watch my kids cruise around on it. So far it's built very well and held up well. I even ride it on occasion and it hasn't broke yet!!
customer_reviews.author: J-man

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: The breaks are hard to reach for our 6 year old's hands, but he still loves to ride it. Great for our 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: KJC

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: Handlebar broke within the first 4 months and will not turn right or left. I like the original Razor PowerWing better because it's more steady.
customer_reviews.author: ginta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Scooter!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 10 year old son for his birthday in February and he has been on it every day since! He just loves it and rides it to school. It is a great scooter! Now we have to get one for his 12 year old sister and 5 year old brother who always want a turn, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Love the Razor PowerWing DLX
customer_reviews.text: The night my son got it the entire family was here. Everyone wanted to ride it. My son is 8 and thinks it is really cool, but so did his 50 year old uncle. This is very well made and the handle bar folds down nicely to be loaded into a trunk to take to a park or a friends house. I would recommend this product. I bought this one of the less expensive model because the handle can be adjusted for height, so I thought the extra money was worth it to grow with my son.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Steiner

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: DD asked for the powerwing for Christmas. I ordered the Deluxe model since she is 12 and needed the larger size and adjustable height. She loves it and is very happy. She has been using it outside even though the weather is only 30 degrees. I imagine it will get a lot of use as the days grow longer and warmer. Overall, happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson's 11th birthday. He loves it!! He would ride it more often but he has to beat his 9 year old sister to it first!
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this powerwing for my sons 10th birthday and I was a little reluctant but have to admit it is very fun even for my husband and I.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyD

customer_reviews.title: PowerWing
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I had bought for my son. He is all about tricks when it comes to bicycle's, skateboards, skates, etc.. But this powerwing doesn't stand up to a lot of "tricks". It was a fun toy and he loved it before he broke it. So, if you buy this product, make sure your child isn't rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Fun scooter even for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old grandson for his birthday. It took him a short time to master the movement necessary to get the scooter going, and he really loves it and has fun on it. The neighbor kids also like to ride it!
customer_reviews.author: sjmadtown

customer_reviews.title: RAZOR POWERWING DLX
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED THE POWERWING FOR MY 7 YEAR OLD GRANDSON AND HE LOVES IT...SOME OF OUR ADDULT FAMILY MEMBERS EVEN CAN RIDE. GROOOD EXERCISE AND I WOULD ORDER AGAIN.. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PW. VERY STURDY AND EASY TO PUT TOGETHER... HAND BRAKE IS NICE TO HAVE 'CAUSE SWINGING HIPS SIDE TO SIDE , YOU CAN REALLY GET UP SOME SPEED. I WOULD SUGGEST USING ON A LEVEL PLANE ANAD NOT ON A STEEP HILL.. FUN PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: PAT

customer_reviews.title: Present for my 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old love this scooter. No one has one like it in the neighborhood. There is some assembly required, but very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: It has been too cold to go out and play but my granddaughter has been using it in the garage and can't wait for the good weather. She loves it and the movement of her hips is also causing some tightening, which she loves.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Koch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was expected. Was exactly what my son wanted. Made strong for those hard to play boys
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Delcambre

customer_reviews.title: Razor PowerWing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter. Very easy to put together and my daughter loves it. Me and her Dad tried it also and I have to say it's really fun to ride. Just need to be careful if going down hill and turning...you might wipe out. Only problem I noticed was the brake on the handle bar didn't seem to work to good but other then that loved the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun until my daughter fell off it and broke her wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my 7 year old! Wow how the 'Razor's' have changed!
customer_reviews.author: JackieWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loved the Razor PowerWing DLX. I had previously purchased one for her older brother and she loved his. She received hers on her 9th birthday and was very excited with her gift! It was convenient for me since I was able to purchase her gift online and have it shipped directly to her.
customer_reviews.author: joyyehl

customer_reviews.title: We love these scooters
customer_reviews.text: We love these scooters! My three kids use them frequently, even to play a form of hockey, using the back wheels to propel a large flat disc as the puck.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L Jones

customer_reviews.title: easy rider
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 11 year old who is 5'3 and 80lbs. she likes it,easy to ride and turn great, and folds up which makes it easy to store in the garage. also bought a 3 wheel flikr which is heavier but better constructed and a bit more expensive. The wheels onthis one could be better, but id buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: h2odad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this thing, wish I had bought two.
customer_reviews.author: St Louis Mom

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for her 6th birthday. She absolutely loves this scooter! It's easy to ride and navigate. Both my son and I love riding it too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Autonomous

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson in September and it's still the first thing he gets on after school. It's a good form of everxise. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Plain

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter!
customer_reviews.text: Great for little kids. Granddaughter has one and got this one for grandson who loved using his cousin's while visiting!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ambrosius

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun, let's you get up those gentle hills with ...
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun, let's you get up those gentle hills with some flare. A nice extension to this popular and durable line.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece is 8 and loved it when she got it for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a good workout and fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old son absolutely loves this scooter! It is a good workout and fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson always wanted one of these razors. He loves it. He can easily handle it and whips down the sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. It's a great exercise, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ann in Corpus Christi

customer_reviews.title: SUPER fun ride!
customer_reviews.text: Got one for our 9 year old and his 11 year old brother loved it! Now we own two!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old. He loves it. Fits him perfectly. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My * yr old rides this powerwing everyday, well made unlike previous models. I weigh 200 lbs and I can ride this thing around the gargage. Works best on smooth surface, but still performs well on asphalt.
customer_reviews.author: P. Blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Great razor/scooter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my son, and he absolutely LOVED it, it is perfect for any kid with poor balance, since they can control how fast or how slow they go on a flat surface. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Razor PowerWing DLX  scooter
customer_reviews.text: The 10 year old girl I gave this to just loved it. The fact that it's more secure than a regular scooter made it the perfect choice for her.
customer_reviews.author: sleepyhead

customer_reviews.title: all metal
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy assembly. This is much better for taller riders as it has a longer steering handle as well as the foot rests are wider.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves this and would spend hours using it if she could.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 years old and his friend has a Powerwing razor. I decided to get my son the DLX just so that it would look different. It arrived from Amazon exactly when the shipment date stated. It was a cool looking powerwing and the wheels were more percision than the regular Powerwing. My son loves it and his friend likes to ride my son's Powerwing rather than his own. Good product, good price and durable. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: MH1

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a favorite holiday gift. Worth getting for an 8-12 year old boy. This is one of the few ways to get my kids off of electronics.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: The scooter is a good size and made with beefy materials
customer_reviews.text: The scooter is a good size and made with beefy materials. Quality seems very good. My daughters are 6 and 9 and both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Toepfer

customer_reviews.title: We are so glad we got the bigger one so it will last ...
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the powerwing. We are so glad we got the bigger one so it will last for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 yr old granddaughter. It was a breeze to assemble and my grand loves it. Within minutes she was off and going. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our 4 yr old grandson.
customer_reviews.text: They could still make instructions more user friendly. It took two of us to dissect the instructions....we looked at the exterior of the box for clues. Very durable and soooo much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Bearings need constant replacing
customer_reviews.text: Have had to replace the bearings on this twice now. Would be a great product if it did not have the problem with the bearings. Bearings barely last a month
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Hope this is good
customer_reviews.text: My friend had one of these for like 2 years. One day we were wheeling (aka doing manuals) for about 3 blocks when the frame where you stand snapped! For casual/basic riding u really don't need any protective gear (coming from a 13 year old) because you don't get very fast. You might want to wear a helmet if ur doing things lime 360s on the back 2 wheels. I will update this when I get it for a further review
customer_reviews.author: RANDOM

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment - great for our 6- and 9-year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these Razors are so fun for our 6 and 9-year old kids! They took about 15 minutes to put together and seem very sturdy, strong and fun. I would recommend a helmet since they can spin very fast and have a bit of a sharper learning curve for young children than the standard scooter. We have only tried these out in our large garage since WY winter prevents us at this time, but they had hours of fun on Xmas day and continue to do so. Great riding toy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HipShopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both boys love it! great fun and exercise at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his new scooter
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves his new scooter. It's different than his other scooter because you have to swivel your hips to get it going. Can be a little difficult going uphill, but great for flat surfaces!
customer_reviews.author: L. Berrodin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So fun. My husband & I ride it too. Make sure you wear a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: 123go

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so much fun, kids love it and so do we! time to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hadd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! The kids absolutely love them and even my husband too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Bates

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and Amazon had a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

product_meta.title: Razor PowerWing DLX Caster Scooter
feature_bullets: Get in on the three-wheel action with the super deluxe size PowerWing DLX
120mm urethane front wheel, 64mm urethane rear wheels for smooth riding on a variety of surfaces
Features a hand brake, adjustable handlebar height, and folding mechanism for easy transporting and storage
